about_the_game:
The gorgeously desolated world of Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider flawlessly channels the halcyon days of the 16-bit era through intricate pixel art, inspiring a striking gauntlet across eight deadly stages. From start to finish, you’ll enjoy seamless platforming action for a tight, focused experience that never lets its blade get dull.

Complementing these beautiful pixel graphics is an incredible soundtrack with a timeless, nostalgic vibe. The result is the quintessential retro experience.

Track List


1. Intro
2. Main Menu
3. Tutorial
4. Stage Select
5. Bioweapon Lab (Act 1)
6. Bioweapon Lab (Act 2)
7. Mid Boss
8. Genoqueen
9. Power Up Chip
10. Propaganda
11. Nightmare
12. Desalination Facility (Act 1)
13. Desalination Facility (Act 2)
14. Submerged Mid Boss
15. Hydromancer
16. Evil
17. Fallen City (Act 1)
18. Fallen City (Act 2)
19. Flamestalker
20. Asura's Fleet (Act 1)
21. Asura's Fleet (Act 2)
22. Stormdiver
23. Ride
24. Laser Research Base (Act 1)
25. Laser Research Base (Act 2)
26. Geocrusher
27. Iwondonilo City (Act 1)
28. Iwondonlio City (Act 2)
29. Photondrifter
30. Lost Ruins (Act 1)
31. Lost Ruins (Act 2)
32. Darkchaser
33. Freedom Fighters
34. Duas Space Elevator (Act 1)
35. Duas Space Elevator (Act 2)
36. Penralese Space Station
37. Sunseeker (Phase 1)
38. Sunseeker (Phase 2)
39. Stage Clear
40. Ending
41. Credits
42. The End
43. Trailer Intro (Bonus Track)

Composed by Dominic Ninmark, this 43 tracks album will help you get through your journey of vengeance.
